key_points: James Michael Tyler, known for his role as Gunther in Friends, passed away on October 24, 2021, from prostate cancer at age 59.
Colin Powell, the first Black U.S. secretary of state, died of COVID-19 complications on October 18, 2021, at age 84.
Halyna Hutchins, a cinematographer, was fatally wounded on the set of the movie Rust by a prop gun on October 21, 2021.
R&B singer Emani 22 (Emani Johnson) passed away on October 11, 2021, at age 22 after a tragic accident.
Ronnie Tutt, legendary drummer for Elvis Presley, died on October 16, 2021, at age 83.
Kenyan long-distance runner Agnes Tirop was stabbed to death on October 13, 2021, at age 25.
Ricarlo Flanagan, comedian and actor, died from COVID-19 complications on October 12, 2021, at age 41.
Jay Black, frontman of Jay and The Americans, died from pneumonia leading to cardiac arrest on October 22, 2021, at age 82.
Swedish rapper Ein√°r was shot dead in Stockholm on October 21, 2021, at age 19 in a gang-related incident.
Tommy DeBarge, a member of the R&B group Switch, died on October 21, 2021.
spokespersons: Elvis Presley Enterprises (on Ronnie Tutt's death)
